meanings.sent1: After reaching the bottom, he started reascending the stairs.
meanings.sent2: She paused briefly before reascending the hill to reach the top.
meanings.sent3: The cat kept reascending the tree, making the dog chase it each time.
meanings.sent4: Like a phoenix, the flames seemed to be reascending into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The hot air balloon was reascending gracefully, floating higher and higher.

meanings.sent1: The elevator suddenly stopped, then began reascending to the top floor.
meanings.sent2: The hiker had to reascend the mountain to retrieve his lost backpack.
meanings.sent3: The toy car kept reascending the ramp, delighting the child each time.
meanings.sent4: Her spirits were reascending as she received encouraging news.
meanings.sent5: The bubbles in the soda were reascending rapidly, fizzing up the drink.

meanings.sent1: The rock climber slipped but quickly reascended the cliff with determination.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter had to reascend the ladder to rescue the trapped kitten.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel kept reascending the tree, dropping acorns on the ground.
meanings.sent4: His popularity was reascending as he won over the audience with his performance.
meanings.sent5: The kite was reascending in the wind, soaring higher than before.
